attributes.action: Request Her Majesty to bestow a Knighthood on Freddie Flintoff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A truly inspirational figure. A man of the people. A great competitor. A modern day warrior. A hero. A modest man.

Make it happen.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
